# CoralCSS - LLM Reference

> Zero-dependency CSS framework with utility-first classes, headless components, and modern CSS features.

## Installation
```bash
npm install @coral-css/core
```

## Quick Start
```typescript
import { createCoral, coralPreset } from '@coral-css/core'

const coral = createCoral()
coralPreset().forEach(p => coral.use(p))
const css = coral.generate(['flex', 'p-4', 'bg-coral-500'])
```

## Core API

### createCoral(options?)
Creates engine instance. Options: `prefix`, `darkMode` ('class'|'media'|'selector'|'auto').

### coral.use(plugin)
Registers a plugin. Returns coral instance for chaining.

### coral.generate(classes)
Generates CSS from class array. Returns CSS string.

### coral.parse(html)
Extracts classes from HTML. Returns class array.

## Presets
- `coralPreset()` - Default with modern CSS
- `windPreset()` - Tailwind-compatible
- `miniPreset()` - Minimal utilities
- `fullPreset()` - Everything included

## Utility Classes

### Spacing
`p-{0-96}`, `m-{0-96}`, `gap-{0-96}`, `px-4`, `py-2`, `mt-4`, `-mt-4`

### Sizing
`w-{0-96}`, `h-{0-96}`, `size-{0-96}`, `w-full`, `w-1/2`, `min-w-0`, `max-w-lg`

### Layout
`flex`, `grid`, `block`, `inline`, `hidden`, `absolute`, `relative`, `fixed`

### Flexbox
`items-center`, `justify-between`, `flex-1`, `flex-col`, `flex-wrap`

### Grid
`grid-cols-{1-12}`, `grid-rows-{1-6}`, `col-span-{1-12}`, `row-span-{1-6}`

### Typography
`text-{xs-9xl}`, `font-{sans|serif|mono}`, `font-{normal|medium|bold}`, `tracking-tight`, `leading-relaxed`

### Colors
`bg-{color}-{50-950}`, `text-{color}-{50-950}`, `border-{color}-{50-950}`
Colors: coral, slate, gray, red, orange, amber, yellow, lime, green, emerald, teal, cyan, sky, blue, indigo, violet, purple, fuchsia, pink, rose

### Borders
`rounded-{none|sm|md|lg|xl|full}`, `border-{0|2|4|8}`, `ring-{0|1|2|4|8}`

### Effects
`shadow-{sm|md|lg|xl|2xl}`, `opacity-{0-100}`, `blur-{sm|md|lg|xl}`

### Transforms
`scale-{0-150}`, `rotate-{0-180}`, `translate-x-{0-96}`, `-translate-y-4`

### Transitions
`transition`, `transition-colors`, `duration-{75-1000}`, `ease-{in|out|in-out}`

## Variants

### Pseudo
`hover:`, `focus:`, `active:`, `disabled:`, `first:`, `last:`, `odd:`, `even:`

### Group/Peer
`group-hover:`, `peer-focus:`, `peer-checked:`

### Responsive
`sm:` (640px), `md:` (768px), `lg:` (1024px), `xl:` (1280px), `2xl:` (1536px)

### Dark Mode
`dark:bg-slate-900`, `dark:text-white`

### Variant Groups (Unique!)
`hover:(bg-coral-500 text-white scale-105)` - Apply multiple utilities to one variant

## Modern CSS

### Container Queries
```html
<div class="@container">
  <div class="@sm:flex @md:grid">...</div>
</div>
```

### Anchor Positioning
```html
<button class="anchor-name-[--btn]">Anchor</button>
<div class="position-anchor-[--btn] position-area-bottom">Tooltip</div>
```

### Scroll Animations
`animation-timeline-scroll`, `animation-range-entry`

## Headless Components

```typescript
import { createDialog, createDropdown, createTabs } from '@coral-css/core/components'

// Dialog
const dialog = createDialog('#modal', { closeOnBackdrop: true, trapFocus: true })
dialog.open()
dialog.close()

// Dropdown
const dropdown = createDropdown('#menu')
dropdown.element.addEventListener('coral:dropdown:select', e => console.log(e.detail))

// Tabs
const tabs = createTabs('#tabs', { defaultTab: 0 })
tabs.selectTab(1)

// Also: createAccordion, createTooltip, createSwitch, createToast
```

## Build Tools

### Vite
```typescript
import coral from '@coral-css/core/vite'
export default { plugins: [coral({ darkMode: 'class' })] }
```

### PostCSS
```javascript
module.exports = {
  plugins: [require('@coral-css/core/postcss')({ content: ['./src/**/*.html'] })]
}
```

### CDN
```html
<script src="https://unpkg.com/@coral-css/core/dist/cdn.iife.js"></script>
<script>const coral = window.CoralCSS.getCoralCDN()</script>
```

## Arbitrary Values
`w-[200px]`, `h-[50vh]`, `bg-[#ff5733]`, `text-[1.5rem]`, `p-[calc(1rem+5px)]`

## TypeScript Types
```typescript
import type { Coral, Plugin, Rule, Variant, Theme, ComponentConfig } from '@coral-css/core'
```
